text: Xindao de renmen a! Nimen buyao ze bei shou shi de ren he sunhai ta, er shi nimen de shishe bian wei wuxiao, youru wei guming er shishe caichan, bing bu xin zhenzhu he houshi de ren yiyang. Ta piru yige guanghua de shitou, shangmian puzhe yi ceng futu, yizhen dayu, shi ta bian de you ying you hua. Tamen buneng huode tamen suo shishe de renhe baochou.
